cancelOwnershipHandover().details: Cancels the two-step ownership handover to the caller, if any.

params.edition_: The {Edition} for which to collect the creation fee.
params.feePayer_: The address of the account paying the fee.
params.tokenId_: The token ID associated with the fee.

params.amount_: The amount of the fee to collect.
params.edition_: The {Edition} for which to collect the mint fee.
params.payer_: The address of the account paying the fee.
params.referrer_: The address of the referrer to receive a share of the fee.
params.tokenId_: The token ID associated with the fee.

params.amount_: The amount of the fee to collect.
params.edition: The {Edition} for which the fee is being collected.
params.payer_: The address of the account paying the fee.
params.referrer_: The address of the referrer to receive a share of the fee.
params.strategy_: The {Strategy} to use for computing the fee split.
params.tokenId_: The token ID associated with the fee.

completeOwnershipHandover(address).details: Allows the owner to complete the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`. Reverts if there is no existing ownership handover requested by `pendingOwner`.

params.protocolFeeReceiver_: The address of the protocol fee receiver.

params.attributions_: The attributions to be associated with the route.
params.edition_: The {Edition} for which to create the route.
params.referrer_: The address of the referrer to receive a share of the fee.
params.tokenId_: The token ID associated with the route.

params.edition_: The {Edition} for which to get the fee receiver.

returns._0: feeReceiver The {Target} to receive the fee.

params.protocolFee_: The amount from which to calculate the collection referrer share.

getCreationFee().details: The creation fee is a flat fee collected by the protocol when a new {Edition} is created.

getMintFee((address,uint112,uint16,uint1.details: The mint fee is calculated as the sum of:      - The {Strategy.mintFee}.      - The {protocolFlatFee}.

params.quantity_: The quantity of tokens being minted.
params.strategy_: The {Strategy} for which to calculate the mint fee.

getMintFee(address,uint256,uint256).details: The mint fee is calculated as the sum of:      - The mint fee specified by the creator in the {Strategy}.      - The protocol's base transaction fee (see {protocolFlatFee}).

params.edition_: The {Edition} for which to calculate the mint fee.

params.protocolFee_: The amount from which to calculate the referrer share.

params.edition_: The {Edition} for which to get the route ID.
params.tokenId_: The token ID for which to get the route ID.

grantRoles(address,uint256).details: Allows the owner to grant `user` `roles`. If the `user` already has a role, then it will be an no-op for the role.

owner().details: Returns the owner of the contract.

ownershipHandoverExpiresAt(address).details: Returns the expiry timestamp for the two-step ownership handover to `pendingOwner`.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the owner to renounce their ownership.

renounceRoles(uint256).details: Allow the caller to remove their own roles. If the caller does not have a role, then it will be an no-op for the role.

requestOwnershipHandover().details: Request a two-step ownership handover to the caller. The request will automatically expire in 48 hours (172800 seconds) by default.

revokeRoles(address,uint256).details: Allows the owner to remove `user` `roles`. If the `user` does not have a role, then it will be an no-op for the role.

setProtocolFees(uint64,uint64,uint16,uin.details: This function can only be called by the owner or an admin.

params.collectionReferrerRevshareBps_: The new collection referrer revenue share in basis points. This plus the mint referrer share cannot exceed {MAX_ROYALTY_BPS}.
params.mintReferrerRevshareBps_: The new mint referrer revenue share in basis points. This plus the collection referrer share cannot exceed {MAX_ROYALTY_BPS}.
params.protocolCreationFee_: The new protocol creation fee. This fee is collected when a new {Edition} is created. Cannot exceed {MAX_PROTOCOL_FEE}.
params.protocolFeeShareBps_: The new protocol fee share in basis points. Cannot exceed {MAX_PROTOCOL_FEE_BPS}.
params.protocolFlatFee_: The new protocol flat fee. This fee is collected on all mint transactions. Cannot exceed {MAX_PROTOCOL_FEE}.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the owner to transfer the ownership to `newOwner`.

withdraw(address,uint256,address).details: This is meant to be used in cases where the contract is holding assets that it should not be. This function can only be called by an admin.

params.amount_: The amount of the asset to withdraw.
params.asset_: The address of the asset to withdraw.
params.to_: The address to send the asset to.

collectCreationFee(address,uint256,addre.notice: Collects the creation fee for a given {Edition}.

collectMintFee(address,uint256,uint256,a.notice: Collects the mint fee for a given {Edition}.
Collects the mint fee for a given {Edition} and token ID, routing it as appropriate.

collectionReferrerRevshareBps().notice: The share of protocol fees to be distributed to the referrer of the collection, in basis points (BPS).

createRoute(address,uint256,(uint256,add.notice: Creates a new fee route for the given {Edition} and attributions.

feeReceiver(address,uint256).notice: Gets the fee receiver for a given {Edition}.

getCollectionReferrerShare(uint256,addre.notice: Calculates the collection referrer share for a given amount.

getCreationFee().notice: Calculates the fee for creating a new {Edition}.

getMintFee((address,uint112,uint16,uint1.notice: Calculates the mint fee for a given {Strategy} based on the quantity of tokens being minted.

getMintFee(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the mint fee for a given {Edition} based on its {Strategy}.

getMintReferrerShare(uint256,address).notice: Calculates the referrer share for a given amount.

getRouteId(address,uint256).notice: Gets the route ID for a given {Edition} and token ID.

mintReferrerRevshareBps().notice: The share of protocol fees to be distributed to the direct referrer of the mint, in basis points (BPS).

protocolCreationFee().notice: The protocol creation fee. This fee is collected when a new {Edition} is created.

protocolFeeReceiver().notice: The address of the protocol fee receiver.

protocolFeeshareBps().notice: The protocol fee share in basis points (BPS). Only applies to protocol fees collected for unpriced mints.

protocolFlatFee().notice: The flat fee for the protocol. This fee is collected on all mint transactions.

referrers(address).notice: The mapping of referrers for each {Edition}'s creation.

setProtocolFees(uint64,uint64,uint16,uin.notice: Updates the protocol fees which are collected for various actions.

splitFactory().notice: The {SplitFactoryV2} contract used to create fee splits.

validateStrategy((address,uint112,uint16.notice: Returns a validated {Strategy} based on the given data.

withdraw(address,uint256,address).notice: An escape hatch to transfer any trapped assets from the contract to the given address.

@dev The maximum protocol fee in wei. Applies to both flat and percentage fees.
@dev The maximum royalty fee in basis points (BPS). Equivalent to 95%.
@dev The minimum royalty fee in basis points (BPS). Equivalent to 2.5%.

@notice The flat fee for the protocol. This fee is collected on all mint transactions.
@notice The protocol fee share in basis points (BPS). Only applies to protocol fees collected for unpriced mints.

@notice The share of protocol fees to be distributed to the referrer of the collection, in basis points (BPS).
@notice The address of the protocol fee receiver.
@notice The {SplitFactoryV2} contract used to create fee splits.
